article.body: After years of escalating drama, the Conway family is officially standing down. Top Trump adviser Kellyanne Conway will leave the White House by the end of the month, the Washington Post first reported Sunday, in the interests of her family. The polar-opposite stances have been the source of friction for years, according to media reports.
